description.en: Learn how to use 'as much as' for comparisons with uncountable nouns.
description.es: Aprende a usar 'as much as' para comparaciones con sustantivos incontables.

prompt.es: No dispongo de tanto tiempo como antes.

exercises.solution: I don't have as much time as I used to.

tip.en: Use 'as much as' with uncountable nouns (time, money, water, etc.): as much + uncountable noun + as.
tip.es: Usa 'as much as' con sustantivos incontables (time, money, water, etc.): as much + sustantivo incontable + as.

prompt.es: Hice el doble de trabajo la semana pasada que la anterior.

exercises.solution: I did twice as much work last week as the week before.

tip.en: For multiples with uncountable nouns: number + times + as much + noun + as (e.g., twice as much work as).
tip.es: Para múltiplos con sustantivos incontables: número + times + as much + sustantivo + as (ej., twice as much work as).
